articles.title: 'If you can't change a man, change the man': McCullum 'very, very disappointed' with KKR batsmen, hints at changes - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A livid KKR coach Brendon McCullum came down heavily on his team's top-order batsmen for not showing enough "intent and aggression" in the ongoing IPL after demanding "loyalty" from him during team selection.
